RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata

Added MetadataRightsList and RightsList(s). Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Updated to 2.7.1. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: AIM/CDE (Cosmic Dust Experiment) data are available as Levels 1 and 2 daily netCDF files. L1 data contains, for each dust grain impact, a time tag, pulse height data, a number of electrons released by the impact, and engineering and housekeeping data. L2 data adds the mass of the impacting particle and spacecraft location at time of impact. Future L3 and L4 products will add total mass impacting per orbit and impact rates (L3) and mass correlation with CIPS total particle mass and Polar Mesospheric Cloud brightness.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: National Aeronautics and Space Administration; Laboratory for Atmospheric and Space Physics (LASP) of Colorado University; Dr. Mihaly Horanyi; Dr. James M. Russell, III

Parameter.Name: Mass Treshold
Parameter.Description: Threshold in grams.

Parameter.Name: GPS Time
Parameter.Description: GPS time tag. Time of event in gps.

Parameter.Name: Channel
Parameter.Description: ID of the channel

Parameter.Name: Charge
Parameter.Description: Charge generated from each event

Parameter.Name: Mass of the Particle
Parameter.Description: Mass of a particle that would cause this event.

Parameter.Name: Sigma Plus for Mass
Parameter.Description: Plus sigma for mass generated

Parameter.Name: Sigma Minus for Mass
Parameter.Description: Minus sigma for mass generated

Element.Name: CDE defined coordinate system with 0-360 degrees of latitude

Parameter.Name: Orbit Number
Parameter.Description: Orbit number during which the event occurred.

Parameter.Name: Science Quality Flag
Parameter.Description: SCIENCE indicates if the data number was interpolated outside of the bounds calibrated on the ground (approximately 63000-8000).

Parameter.Name: Coincident Flag
Parameter.Description: COINCIDENT returns 'COIN' or 'OK' for if another impact shares a timetag with the respective measurement.

Parameter.Name: ANA A Temperature Flag
Parameter.Description: Temp refers to the safety limits on the electronic box components. Allowed values are 'OVER', 'OK', 'LOW', or 'NO_DATA.' Limits are: low:-7.1 degC high: 49.9 degC.

Parameter.Name: ANA B Temperature Flag
Parameter.Description: Temp refers to the safety limits on the electronic box components. Allowed values are 'OVER', 'OK', 'LOW', or 'NO_DATA.' Limits are: low:-7.1 degC high: 49.9 degC.

Parameter.Name: DCDC Converter Temperature Flag
Parameter.Description: Temp refers to the safety limits on the electronic box components. Allowed values are 'OVER', 'OK', 'LOW', or 'NO_DATA.' Limits are: low:-30 degC high: 50 degC.

Parameter.Name: Field Programmable Gate Array Temperature Flag
Parameter.Description: Temp refers to the safety limits on the electronic box components. Allowed values are 'OVER', 'OK', 'LOW', or 'NO_DATA.' Limits are: low:-30 degC high: 50 degC.

Parameter.Name: PNL A Temperature Flag
Parameter.Description: Temp refers to the safety limits on the electronic box components. Allowed values are 'OVER', 'OK', 'LOW', or 'NO_DATA.' Limits are: low:-120 degC high: 80 degC.

Parameter.Name: PNL B Temperature Flag
Parameter.Description: Temp refers to the safety limits on the electronic box components. Allowed values are 'OVER', 'OK', 'LOW', or 'NO_DATA.' Limits are: low:-120 degC high: 80 degC.

Parameter.Name: PNL C Temperature Flag
Parameter.Description: Temp refers to the safety limits on the electronic box components. Allowed values are 'OVER', 'OK', 'LOW', or 'NO_DATA.' Limits are: low:-120 degC high: 80 degC.

Parameter.Name: PNL D Temperature Flag
Parameter.Description: Temp refers to the safety limits on the electronic box components. Allowed values are 'OVER', 'OK', 'LOW', or 'NO_DATA.' Limits are: low:-120 degC high: 80 degC.

Parameter.Name: P5 Volt Flag
Parameter.Description: Volt refers to the safety limits on the electronic box components. Allowed values are 'OVER', 'OK', 'LOW', or 'NO_DATA.' Limits are: low:4.9 high: 5 V.

Parameter.Name: M5 Volt Flag
Parameter.Description: Volt refers to the safety limits on the electronic box components. Allowed values are 'OVER', 'OK', 'LOW', or 'NO_DATA.' Limits are: low:-5.4 high: -5.1 V.

Parameter.Name: Box Temperature Flag
Parameter.Description: Temp refers to the safety limits on the electronic box components. Allowed values are 'OVER', 'OK', 'LOW', or 'NO_DATA.' Limits are: low:-30 degC high: 50 degC.

Parameter.Name: PNL temperature Flag
Parameter.Description: Temp refers to the safety limits on the electronic box components. Allowed values are 'OVER', 'OK', 'LOW', or 'NO_DATA.' Limits are: low:-120 degC high: 80 degC.

Parameter.Name: Volt Flag
Parameter.Description: Volt refers to the safety limits on the electronic box components. Allowed values are 'OVER', 'OK', 'LOW', or 'NO_DATA.' Limits are: low: 36 V high: 36 V.

Parameter.Name: Current Flag
Parameter.Description: Current refers to the safety limits on the electronic box components. Allowed values are 'OVER', 'OK', 'LOW', or 'NO_DATA.' Limits are: low: 120 mA high: 180 mA.

Parameter.Name: Truster Flag
Parameter.Description: THRUSTER returns 'TF' or 'OK' for if a thruster firing occurred within 1 second of the respective measurement.

Parameter.Name: Flag
Parameter.Description: PART_ANG quality flags return 'OVER', 'OK', or 'INVALID' for the angle limit of pi/4. PART_ANG is the angle of the particle's trajectory for a 1 micron particle with respect to zenith using a beta of 0.3 where beta is the ratio of radiation to gravitational force.

Parameter.Name: Ram Angle Flag
Parameter.Description: RAM_ANG quality flags return 'OVER', 'OK', or 'INVALID' for the angle limit of pi/4. RAM_ANG is the angle of the instrument's boresight with respect to the spacecraft's velocity.
